description: Ms. codex. Title from leaves 2a, 68a. Physical description: Text 1, 19 lines per page; text 2, 18 lines per page in two columns. Written in naskh in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication and catchwords. In excellent condition. Origin: Text 1 dated 15 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1347 H [25 April 1929], by ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn (leaf 67a). Text 2 likely completed around the same time.
contents: 2. leaves 68a-122b: Durrat al-Najaf / Muḥammad Mahdī ibn Murtaḍá Baḥr al-ʻUlūm.
extent: 126 leaves : paper ; 209 x 158 (148-154 x 74-93) mm bound to 215 x 160 mm
title: Kitāb Fihrist al-Shīʻah
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding note: Half leather with marbled paper covers; purple paper doublures.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
